title: Obari
author: Obari
content: I have Roblox credit and I don't know how to transfer it because I really need this money and I will glad if anyone can direct how to go about this since it's not a physical card and I'm also will to exchange it for Bitcoin.

comments.author: V4n3ss4
comments.body: how much for this roblox credit?

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: V4n3ss4 on January 24, 2023, 08:21:46 AMhow much for this roblox credit?Firstly so you know how to transfer the credit?If yes then I'm ready to accept $80 for the $100 credit and .also expecting a message from you on this thread soon thanks.

comments.author: Fortunejacksports
comments.body: The only way to do this is for someone to set up a game, place an item for purchase with Roblox, and then for you to purchase that item. You canâ€™t just transfer robluxs
